meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>guts</kanji> feel like they're <kanji>fall</kanji>ing when you experience a lot of <vocabulary>discouragement</vocabulary>. You know that sinking feeling you get in the pit of your stomach? That's your guts falling!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
